entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
